definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Love is a master key which opens the gate of happiness. (Oliver Wedell Holms)
sentences.chinese: 愛是打開快樂之門的萬能鑰匙。

sentences.english: Corporate lawyers often have a one-size-fits-all approach to deals.
sentences.chinese: 公司法律師經常以那種“萬能鑰匙”的方法處理項目。

sentences.english: Use and control hotel key according to hotel policy and Housekeeping principle.
sentences.chinese: 根據酒店的政策和客房部的規定使用和控制萬能鑰匙。

sentences.english: The burglars had used skeleton keys or entered over the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 竊賊或者用了萬能鑰匙，或者是爬越陽臺進入房間的。

definition: Wolf Totem, novel by Lü Jiamin aka Jiang Rong
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: La Comédie humaine, series of novels by 19th century French novelist Honoré de Balzac 巴爾扎克|巴尔扎克[Ba1 er3 zha1 ke4]
lit. firing after the horse/fig. belated action/giving advice in hindsight
(slang) (Tw) person from Taipei 臺北|台北[Tai2 bei3]
extreme benevolence, utmost duty (idiom); meticulous virtue and attention to duty
